ing: 6 ounces halloumi cheese, cut into 1/2 inch thick sticks
des: "Fry or grill this Cypriot-style cheese and serve with a Greek salad and crusty bread for a complete meal."
ins: Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the halloumi sticks, and cook until the cheese turns light, golden-brown, 1 to 2 minutes. Sprinkle with lemon juice, oregano, and pepper to serve.
